item.title: Importing FIA data to analyze forest carbon with tidyFIA
item.description: I used to cringe every time I needed to import Forest Inventory and Analysis data. The data files that contain tree observations for a single state can exceed 100 megabytes. The file I downloaded six months ago might or might not contain the most recent data for that state. There are a few R packages that have been developed in the last several years that help import FIA data.
